stlearn.tl.SpatialDE¶

stlearn.tl.SpatialDE(adata: anndata._core.anndata.AnnData, use_data: str = 'normalized', top_genes: int = 10, kernel_space=None, copy: bool = False)[source]¶

Perform SpatialDE test

X : matrix of spatial coordinates times observations exp_tab : Expression table, assumed appropriatealy normalised.

The grid of covariance matrices to search over for the alternative model can be specifiec using the kernel_space paramter.
